Allocate new device.

Referenced by cl_type_setup().

struct lu_device*(* lu_device_type_operations::ldto_device_fini)(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *) [read]

Finalize device.

Dual to lu_device_type_operations::ldto_device_init(). Returns pointer to the next device in the stack.

Referenced by echo_device_fini(), and lu_stack_fini().

struct lu_device*(* lu_device_type_operations::ldto_device_free)(const struct lu_env *, struct lu_device *) [read]

Free device.

Dual to lu_device_type_operations::ldto_device_alloc(). Returns pointer to the next device in the stack.

Referenced by cl_type_setup(), echo_device_free(), and lu_stack_fini().

int(* lu_device_type_operations::ldto_device_init)(const struct lu_env *env, struct lu_device *, const char *, struct lu_device *)

Initialize the devices after allocation.

Referenced by cl_type_setup(), echo_device_alloc(), lovsub_device_init(), and vvp_device_init().

void(* lu_device_type_operations::ldto_fini)(struct lu_device_type *t)

Finalize device type.

Dual to lu_device_type_operations::ldto_init(). Called on module unload.

Referenced by lu_device_type_fini().

int(* lu_device_type_operations::ldto_init)(struct lu_device_type *t)

Initialize device type.

This is called on module load.

Referenced by lu_device_type_init().

void(* lu_device_type_operations::ldto_start)(struct lu_device_type *t)

Called when the first device is created.

Referenced by lu_device_init().

void(* lu_device_type_operations::ldto_stop)(struct lu_device_type *t)

Called when number of devices drops to 0.

Referenced by lu_device_fini().
